<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Crystal Shards](/Equipment.aspx?ID=685)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 252 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This flask holds a pressurized red-brown gas flecked with bits of sublimated crystal. You gain the listed item bonus to attack rolls. When the bomb explodes, it deals the listed piercing damage and piercing splash damage as the mixture suddenly turns into solid crystals flying at high speeds.

 Surfaces in the splash area grow brittle, gleaming red crystals that crumble to dust after 1 minute. The crystals on level surfaces are [caltrops](/Equipment.aspx?ID=9). The crystals on vertical surfaces can be used briefly as handholds, granting the listed item bonus to the next [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33) each space. The crystals in each space crumble after the creature leaves, whether Climbing or moving through the caltrops.

</column>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +1. The bomb deals 2d4 piercing damage and 4 piercing splash damage.

<row gap="medium">
